Responsibilities: Building hyper-scale database services in the cloud
Revolutionizing the way databases are built for the cloud
Having direct and immediate impact on hundreds of thousands of users who use AWS database services
Owning the design and development of significant system software components critical to our industry leading database services architected for the cloud
Architecting, designing, and implementing highly scalable distributed database systems that provide availability, reliability and performance guarantees
Required Skills: Programming with at least one software programming language
Preferred Qualifications: 3+ years of full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations experience
Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent
job_description_summary.Educational Requirements: Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent

suggestions: Highlight experience with relational databases and large scale storage system technologies. If you have experience with AWS, Aurora, or other cloud platforms, be sure to mention it. Emphasize your skills in areas like scalability, availability, reliability, and performance. Showcase your software development experience, including your knowledge of design patterns, coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.
